about_the_game:
1. Welcome all heroes (Main Menu Theme)
2. The Nyagu's Teachings (Interlude 1 Theme)
3. First Flight (Level 1 Theme)
4. Epic Fight (Level 2 Theme)
5. Bitterness Forever (Interlude 2 Theme)
6. A Space Adventure (Level 3 Theme)
7. On The Moon (Level 4 Theme)
8. What hides behind the Re-wu (Interlude 3 Theme)
9. A Dark Power (Level 5 Theme)
10. Against The Galactic Plague (Level 6 Theme)
11. The Hero Beneath The Skin (Level 7 Theme)
12. The Last Flicker (Interlude 4 Theme)
13. Loneliness Among Disaster (Level 8 Theme)
14. A Deep Breath (Interlude 5 Theme)
15. The Last Battle (Level 9 Theme)
16. A Shooting Star In The Sky (Interlude 6 and Final Credits Theme)
detailed_description:
1. Welcome all heroes (Main Menu Theme)
2. The Nyagu's Teachings (Interlude 1 Theme)
3. First Flight (Level 1 Theme)
4. Epic Fight (Level 2 Theme)
5. Bitterness Forever (Interlude 2 Theme)
6. A Space Adventure (Level 3 Theme)
7. On The Moon (Level 4 Theme)
8. What hides behind the Re-wu (Interlude 3 Theme)
9. A Dark Power (Level 5 Theme)
10. Against The Galactic Plague (Level 6 Theme)
11. The Hero Beneath The Skin (Level 7 Theme)
12. The Last Flicker (Interlude 4 Theme)
13. Loneliness Among Disaster (Level 8 Theme)
14. A Deep Breath (Interlude 5 Theme)
15. The Last Battle (Level 9 Theme)
16. A Shooting Star In The Sky (Interlude 6 and Final Credits Theme)

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04, 64 bit
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4600
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 700 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.9
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4600
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 700 MB available space

name: IRO HERO - Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Window
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Grapics 4600
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Iro Hero's amazing original soundtrack. Arcade and anime influences put together into 16 rocking sci-fi tunes.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Korean*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
